title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Vacation Cabin Environmental Assessment
body: Vacation Cabin Environmental Assessment       In accordance with the National Environmental Policy Act, the National Park Service examined the impacts and suitability of private vacation cabins along the shoreline of Lake Roosevelt at Rickey Point and Sherman Creek and has issued a 2011 Vacation Cabin Environmental Assessment (corrections to pg. 42) and a Finding of No Significant Impact. For more information please contact: Commercial Services Specialist Marsha Buchanan, 509-633-9441 ext. 140, Marsha_Buchanan@nps.gov
